svg.title: Cat Cardiovascular System — Anterior Cross-Section
svg.desc: Interactive SVG of a domestic cat heart showing all four chambers, great vessels, valves, and major peripheral vasculature for pre-veterinary anatomy study.

g.text: R = Right (viewer left) ← → L = Left (viewer right)

svg.text: AnatoView v1.0.0 — Cat Cardiovascular Model — 20 labeled structures
